headline: Sen. Tillis Calls For Insider Trading Probe Over Rep. Cawthorn's Ties To Let's Go Brandon' Meme Coin
author: Anna Kaplan
sentences: Tillis endorsed Cawthorn's primary challenger Chuck Edwards last month, saying Cawthorn has fallen well short of the most basic standards Western North Carolina expects from their representatives.? Tillis has also previously called for his fellow senator, Richard Burr (R-N.C.), to explain himself to the country over a call Burr made to his brother, who then sold shares in February 2020ahead of the stock market crash caused by the coronavirus pandemic.

Topline
Sen. Thom Tillis called Wednesday for the House Ethics Committee to investigate fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn after watchdog agencies told the Washington Examiner the congressman could be implicated in an insider trading schemethe latest in a series of scandals for Cawthorn.

Multiple watchdog groups told the Examiner that Cawthorn's Instagram post suggests he may have had previous non-public knowledge of the sponsorship deal with Brown, and said investigations from the Department of Justice and the Securities and Exchange Commission would be warranted.
